_instructions: Copy this template to YYYY-MM-DD-<session-name>.json. Fill in all required fields. Delete this _instructions field.
purpose: What hypothesis are we testing? What do we want to learn?

prompts.base_positive: The common positive prompt elements shared across experiments
prompts.variations: Description of what was varied (poses, expressions, etc.)

experiments.prompt_variation: What was different about this run's prompt
experiments.feedback: YOUR FEEDBACK HERE - be specific about what works/doesn't work

key_learnings: What we learned from this experiment session
